sub_questions.explanation: দেওয়া আছে, a = cot ⁡ θ a = \cot\theta a = cot θ এবং b = cosec ⁡ θ − 1 b = \operatorname{cosec}\theta - 1 b = cosec θ − 1 এখন, a + b a − b = cot ⁡ θ + cosec ⁡ θ − 1 cot ⁡ θ − cosec ⁡ θ + 1 = cot ⁡ θ + cosec ⁡ θ − 1 cot ⁡ θ − cosec ⁡ θ + ( cosec ⁡ 2 θ − cot ⁡ 2 θ ) = cot ⁡ θ + cosec ⁡ θ − 1 ( cosec ⁡ θ − cot ⁡ θ ) ( cosec ⁡ θ + cot ⁡ θ ) − ( cosec ⁡ θ − cot ⁡ θ ) = ( cot ⁡ θ + cosec ⁡ θ − 1 ) ( cosec ⁡ θ − cot ⁡ θ ) ( cosec ⁡ θ + cot ⁡ θ − 1 ) = 1 cosec ⁡ θ − cot ⁡ θ = 1 1 sin ⁡ θ − cos ⁡ θ sin ⁡ θ = 1 1 − cos ⁡ θ sin ⁡ θ = sin ⁡ θ 1 − cos ⁡ θ \begin{aligned} \frac{a+b}{a-b} &= \frac{\cot\theta + \operatorname{cosec}\theta - 1}{\cot\theta - \operatorname{cosec}\theta + 1} \\ &= \frac{\cot\theta + \operatorname{cosec}\theta - 1}{\cot\theta - \operatorname{cosec}\theta + (\operatorname{cosec}^2\theta - \cot^2\theta)} \\ &= \frac{\cot\theta + \operatorname{cosec}\theta - 1}{(\operatorname{cosec}\theta - \cot\theta)(\operatorname{cosec}\theta + \cot\theta) - (\operatorname{cosec}\theta - \cot\theta)} \\ &= \frac{(\cot\theta + \operatorname{cosec}\theta - 1)}{(\operatorname{cosec}\theta - \cot\theta)(\operatorname{cosec}\theta + \cot\theta - 1)} \\ &= \frac{1}{\operatorname{cosec}\theta - \cot\theta} \\ &= \frac{1}{\frac{1}{\sin\theta} - \frac{\cos\theta}{\sin\theta}} \\ &= \frac{1}{\frac{1-\cos\theta}{\sin\theta}} \\ &= \frac{\sin\theta}{1-\cos\theta} \end{aligned} a − b a + b ​ ​ = cot θ − cosec θ + 1 cot θ + cosec θ − 1 ​ = cot θ − cosec θ + ( cosec 2 θ − cot 2 θ ) cot θ + cosec θ − 1 ​ = ( cosec θ − cot θ ) ( cosec θ + cot θ ) − ( cosec θ − cot θ ) cot θ + cosec θ − 1 ​ = ( cosec θ − cot θ ) ( cosec θ + cot θ − 1 ) ( cot θ + cosec θ − 1 ) ​ = cosec θ − cot θ 1 ​ = s i n θ 1 ​ − s i n θ c o s θ ​ 1 ​ = s i n θ 1 − c o s θ ​ 1 ​ = 1 − cos θ sin θ ​ ​ ∴ a + b a − b = sin ⁡ θ 1 − cos ⁡ θ \therefore \frac{a+b}{a-b} = \frac{\sin\theta}{1-\cos\theta} ∴ a − b a + b ​ = 1 − c o s θ s i n θ ​ ∴ ( a + b ) ( 1 − cos ⁡ θ ) = ( a − b ) sin ⁡ θ  (দেখানো হলো) \therefore (a+b)(1-\cos\theta) = (a-b)\sin\theta \text{ (দেখানো হলো)} ∴ ( a + b ) ( 1 − cos θ ) = ( a − b ) sin θ  ( দেখানো   হলো )

sub_questions.explanation: দেওয়া আছে, a 2 + ( b + 1 ) 2 = 3 a^2 + (b+1)^2 = 3 a 2 + ( b + 1 ) 2 = 3 বা, c o t 2 θ + ( c o s e c θ − 1 + 1 ) 2 = 3 cot^2\theta + (cosec\theta - 1 + 1)^2 = 3 co t 2 θ + ( cosec θ − 1 + 1 ) 2 = 3 (মান বসিয়ে) বা, c o t 2 θ + c o s e c 2 θ = 3 cot^2\theta + cosec^2\theta = 3 co t 2 θ + cose c 2 θ = 3 বা, c o t 2 θ + 1 + c o t 2 θ = 3 cot^2\theta + 1 + cot^2\theta = 3 co t 2 θ + 1 + co t 2 θ = 3 বা, 2 c o t 2 θ = 2 2cot^2\theta = 2 2 co t 2 θ = 2 বা, c o t 2 θ = 1 cot^2\theta = 1 co t 2 θ = 1 বা, c o t θ = ± 1 cot\theta = \pm 1 co tθ = ± 1 হয়, c o t θ = 1 cot\theta = 1 co tθ = 1 বা, c o t θ = 1 = c o t π 4 = c o t ( π + π 4 ) cot\theta = 1 = cot\frac{\pi}{4} = cot(\pi + \frac{\pi}{4}) co tθ = 1 = co t 4 π ​ = co t ( π + 4 π ​ ) বা, c o t θ = c o t π 4 = c o t 5 π 4 cot\theta = cot\frac{\pi}{4} = cot\frac{5\pi}{4} co tθ = co t 4 π ​ = co t 4 5 π ​ ∴ θ = π 4 , 5 π 4 \therefore \theta = \frac{\pi}{4}, \frac{5\pi}{4} ∴ θ = 4 π ​ , 4 5 π ​ অথবা, c o t θ = − 1 cot\theta = -1 co tθ = − 1 বা, c o t θ = − 1 = c o t ( π − π 4 ) = c o t ( 2 π − π 4 ) cot\theta = -1 = cot(\pi - \frac{\pi}{4}) = cot(2\pi - \frac{\pi}{4}) co tθ = − 1 = co t ( π − 4 π ​ ) = co t ( 2 π − 4 π ​ ) বা, c o t θ = c o t 3 π 4 = c o t 7 π 4 cot\theta = cot\frac{3\pi}{4} = cot\frac{7\pi}{4} co tθ = co t 4 3 π ​ = co t 4 7 π ​ ∴ θ = 3 π 4 , 7 π 4 \therefore \theta = \frac{3\pi}{4}, \frac{7\pi}{4} ∴ θ = 4 3 π ​ , 4 7 π ​ ∴ 0 ≤ θ ≤ 2 π \therefore 0 \le \theta \le 2\pi ∴ 0 ≤ θ ≤ 2 π ব্যবধিতে প্রদত্ত সমীকরণটির সমাধান: θ = π 4 , 3 π 4 , 5 π 4 , 7 π 4 \theta = \frac{\pi}{4}, \frac{3\pi}{4}, \frac{5\pi}{4}, \frac{7\pi}{4} θ = 4 π ​ , 4 3 π ​ , 4 5 π ​ , 4 7 π ​ (Ans.)

questions.uddipok: একটি নিরপেক্ষ মুদ্রা তিনবার নিক্ষেপ করা হলো।

sub_questions.label: ক
sub_questions.question: দেখাও যে, উদ্দীপকের মুদ্রাটি n-সংখ্যকবার নিক্ষেপ করলে সংঘটিত ঘটনা 2 n 2^n 2 n কে সমর্থন করে।
sub_questions.explanation: (i) কেবলমাত্র একটি টেল পাওয়ার অনুকূল নমুনাক্ষেত্র = {HHT, HTH, THH} ∴ \therefore ∴ অনুকূল নমুনা বিন্দুর সংখ্যা = 3 ∴ \therefore ∴ P [কেবলমাত্র একটি T] = 3 8 \frac{3}{8} 8 3 ​ (Ans.) (ii) কমপক্ষে 1টি হেড (H) পাওয়ার অনুকূল ঘটনাগুলো TTT ছাড়া বাকি সবগুলো অর্থাৎ {HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, HHH} ∴ \therefore ∴ অনুকূল নমুনা বিন্দুর সংখ্যা = 7 ∴ \therefore ∴ P [কমপক্ষে 1H] = 7 8 \frac{7}{8} 8 7 ​ (Ans.)

(ii) কমপক্ষে 1টি হেড (H) পাওয়ার অনুকূল ঘটনাগুলো TTT ছাড়া বাকি সবগুলো অর্থাৎ {HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, HHH} ∴ \therefore ∴ অনুকূল নমুনা বিন্দুর সংখ্যা = 7 ∴ \therefore ∴ P [কমপক্ষে 1H] = 7 8 \frac{7}{8} 8 7 ​ (Ans.)
